Note naturalness and keys

Source: R/notes.R
note_is_natural.Rd

Helper functions for inspecting and manipulating accidentals in noteworthy strings.

note_is_natural(notes)

note_is_accidental(notes)

note_is_flat(notes)

note_is_sharp(notes)

naturalize(notes, type = c("both", "flat", "sharp"),
  ignore_octave = FALSE)

sharpen_flat(notes, ignore_octave = FALSE)

flatten_sharp(notes, ignore_octave = FALSE)

note_set_key(notes, key = "c")

pretty_notes(notes, ignore_octave = TRUE)

Arguments

notes

character, a noteworthy string, space-delimited or vector of individual entries.
type

character, type of note to naturalize.
ignore_octave

logical, strip any octave notation that may be present, returning only the basic notes without explicit pitch.
key

character, key signature to coerce any accidentals to the appropriate form for the key. May also specify "sharp" or "flat".

Value

character

Details

In this context, sharpening flats and flattening sharps refers to inverting their notation, not raising and lowering a flatted or sharped note by one semitone. For the latter, use naturalize, which removes flat and/or sharp notation from a string.

The note_is_* functions strictly allow individual notes, not chords. The other functions listed here accept any noteworthy string including those containing chords.

Examples

x <- "a_ a a#"
note_is_natural(x)
#> [1] FALSE  TRUE FALSE
note_is_accidental(x)
#> [1]  TRUE FALSE  TRUE
note_is_flat(x)
#> [1]  TRUE FALSE FALSE
note_is_sharp(x)
#> [1] FALSE FALSE  TRUE
note_set_key(x, "f")
#> <Noteworthy string>
#>   Format: space-delimited time
#>   Values: a_ a b_
note_set_key(x, "g")
#> <Noteworthy string>
#>   Format: space-delimited time
#>   Values: g# a a#

x <- "e_2 a_, c#f#a#"
naturalize(x)
#> <Noteworthy string>
#>   Format: space-delimited time
#>   Values: e2 a, <cfa>
naturalize(x, "sharp")
#> <Noteworthy string>
#>   Format: space-delimited time
#>   Values: e_2 a_, <cfa>
sharpen_flat(x)
#> <Noteworthy string>
#>   Format: space-delimited time
#>   Values: d#, g#, <c#f#a#>
flatten_sharp(x)
#> <Noteworthy string>
#>   Format: space-delimited time
#>   Values: e_, a_, <d_g_b_>
pretty_notes(x)
#> [1] "Eb Ab C#F#A#"
